strings.name: OpenStreetMap Help
strings.description: Ask a question and get answers on OSM's community-driven question and answer site.
strings.extendedDescription: {url} is for everyone who needs help with OpenStreetMap.  Whether you are a beginner mapper or have a technical question, we're here to help!

resolved.name: OpenStreetMap Help
resolved.description: Ask a question and get answers on OSM's community-driven question and answer site.
resolved.extendedDescription: https://help.openstreetmap.org/ is for everyone who needs help with OpenStreetMap.  Whether you are a beginner mapper or have a technical question, we're here to help!
